document_data.name: Cyriana Raisa Marela Vajra Eralea Rhindaun<ref name=LoI1:T-p82>
document_data.mainbody: '''Her Highness Princess Cyriana Raisa Marela Vajra Eralea Rhindaun''' was the second daughter and third child of Queen [[Zaranda Star]] and King [[Haedrak Rhindaun III]] of [[Tethyr]].<ref name=LoI1:T-p82/> Officially, she was the Princess of [[Ankramir]]<ref name=LoI1:T-p68/> and the third heir to the throne.<ref name=LoI1:T-p82/>
document_data.Description: One of a set of triplets,<ref name=LoI1:T-p52/> Cyriana was unique among the royal children in that she had golden eyes. For this she was seen by the Queen's Minister, Lady [[Harlaa Assumbar]], priestess of [[Siamorphe]], as sacred to her goddess and destined to be a great prophetess.<ref name=LoI1:T-p68/>
document_data.Relationships: Princess Cyriana's regent was [[Vajra Valmeyjar]], Duchess of [[Ankaram]].<ref name=LoI1:T-p68/>
document_data.History: Cyriana and her two siblings were born in the month of [[Flamerule]] in [[1370 DR]]. This was the first time there had been royal triplets in Tethyr since the reign of Queen [[Alisande Bormul]] in [[832 DR]].<ref name=LoI1:T-p52/><ref name=LoI3:E&FoI-p29>
document_data.Rumors and Legends: Several organizations had made plans to kidnap the princess, because of her golden eyes. The church of [[Cyric]] in [[Amn]] and the [[Bane|Banites]] following [[Iyachtu Xvim]] in [[Mintar]] were two such groups. In each case, there were prophecies of their downfall being caused by a golden-eyed child.<ref name=LoI1:T-p68/>
